content: 4mm needle will be holding the sts you k in this last round 1 and the spare needle will be holding the sts you p in round 2 when you have finished this you will have created a channel that will be able to hold your hair elastic see the following picture for some visual help on how this should look like 3 instagram @knittingsofi work the hair elastic into the channel you have created and then work the following round round 1 *k one st of off the first needle together with one off of the spare needle* repeat the instructions between ** until bor you should now have 20 the sts you first cast on the work is probably quite tight and difficult to work now this will resolve during the increases for the second half now work the 20sts as before round 1 *k1 yo pm k1 pm yo* repeat the instructions between ** until bor round 2 *k to m yo sm k1 sm yo* repeat the instructions between ** until bor repeat round 2 for 6 rounds or until work measures 1cm less than your desired size this side is designed to look longer than the first side of the scrunchie but feel free to work them equally as long work 3 rounds of garter stitch p all sts on 1st round k all sts on 2nd round and p all sts on 3rd round and loosely bind off all stitches weave in all ends and enjoy your scrunchie 4 instagram @knittingsofi
